python:
from event_manager import *
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1

event_manager.reset()

def on_event_timer_callback_S_l_K_y_f():

  print(timer.get())
  print(running_time())

event_manager.add_timer_event(1000, on_event_timer_callback_S_l_K_y_f)

if True:
  timer.reset()

while True:
  event_manager.run()
